title: Menken
description: An all-organic health food store with a little bakery (by Bio-Backhaus WÃ¼st) by the entrance. The bakery offers vegan choices for bread and pastries, besides the usual organic bakery items. The store carries the common store items like fruits, vegetables, juices, and a wide range of vegan products such as plant based milks, cheeses, yogurts, soy products, nut butters and more. You can also purchase cleaning supplies as well as cosmetics.
